properties.query:
DeviceRegistryEvents
| where RegistryValueData =~ "Enabled" and RegistryKey contains "\\SOFTWARE\\MICROSOFT\\.NETFramework\\Security\\TrustManager\\PromptingLevel" and (RegistryKey endswith "\\Internet" or RegistryKey endswith "\\LocalIntranet" or RegistryKey endswith "\\MyComputer" or RegistryKey endswith "\\TrustedSites" or RegistryKey endswith "\\UntrustedSites")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects changes to the ClickOnce trust prompt registry key in order to enable an installation from different locations such as the Internet.
